channel.title: Problem Decompiling Maps
channel.description: So im wanting to decompile bm_crossfire.bsp using bspsource ive tried different methods of decompiling but every time i try open it in hammer it either closes hammer after the progress bar reaches 100% or it hammer opens up and you can see a lil bit of the map in the view screen but stop responding any ideas on what i should do or what other decompiler i should use?

item.title: Problem Decompiling Maps
item.dc:creator: Flavrans
item.description:
You can try my modified version of BSPSource which has a fix for this issue. See this post.

Read full topic

item.description:
